Remarks

The MediaWiki extension

This is the MediaWiki extension it self, everything else is just functions and liberaries for this file.

  • string RenderWikiPlot() [line 198]


    Usage: RenderWikiPlot( string $input, array $argv, [Parser $parser = null])

    Parameters

    $input

    The content of the wikiplot tag

    $argv

    Hash-array of the parameters of the wikiplot tag, with parameter-name as key and parameter-value as value.

    $parser

    The parser of MediaWiki, if null parser is obtained from global variable

    Returns

    HTML that can be directly inserted into any website.

    Remarks

    RenderWikiPlot CallBack function

    This is the function that handles MediaWiki callbacks, and renders the actual plot.

    XMLParser

  • void wfWikiPlotExtension() [line 57]


    Usage: wfWikiPlotExtension( )

    Remarks

    Add hooks

    Adds hooks so MediaWiki will perform callback, when it hits the wikiplot tag.

  • void WikiPlotDeserializeBoolean() [line 72]


    Usage: WikiPlotDeserializeBoolean( string $value, boolean &$SetTo)

    Parameters

    $value

    The string you wish to deserialize.

    &$SetTo

    The variable you want the values parsed to.

    Remarks

    Deserialize boolean

    Deserializes a boolean value from string, this function is used when you want to deserialize parameters given in the WikiML. If it is impossible to deserialize the value, the output object is not initialized at all.

    usedby

    RenderWikiPlot()

    access

    private


    [ Top ]

  • void WikiPlotDeserializeColor() [line 159]


    Usage: WikiPlotDeserializeColor( string $value, array &$SetTo)

    Parameters

    $value

    The string you wish to deserialize.

    &$SetTo

    The variable you want the values parsed to.

    Remarks

    Deserialize Color

    Deserializes an array representation of a rgb color from string, this function is used when you want to deserialize parameters given in the WikiML. This function can deserialize colors written as "255,255,255" (rgb) or "#000000" (hex). If it is impossible to deserialize the value, the output object is not initialized at all.

    usedby

    RenderWikiPlot()

    access

    private


    [ Top ]

  • void WikiPlotDeserializeInteger() [line 137]


    Usage: WikiPlotDeserializeInteger( string $value, Integer &$SetTo)

    Parameters

    $value

    The string you wish to deserialize.

    &$SetTo

    The variable you want the values parsed to.

    Remarks

    Deserialize Integer

    Deserializes a integer value from string, this function is used when you want to deserialize parameters given in the WikiML. If it is impossible to deserialize the value, the output object is not initialized at all. Usualy this function does nothing at all, just checks to see if the value can be parsed as an integer.

    usedby

    RenderWikiPlot()

    access

    private


    [ Top ]

  • void WikiPlotDeserializeMixed() [line 114]


    Usage: WikiPlotDeserializeMixed( string $value, integer &$SetTo1, integer &$SetTo2)

    Parameters

    $value

    The string you wish to deserialize.

    &$SetTo1

    The variable you want the values parsed to.

    &$SetTo2

    The variable you want the values parsed to.

    Remarks

    Deserialize Coordiante

    Deserializes a 2 integers from string, this function is used when you want to deserialize parameters given in the WikiML. If it is impossible to deserialize the value, the output object is not initialized at all.

    usedby

    RenderWikiPlot()

    access

    private

    Deserialize String

    Deserializes a string value from string, this function is used when you want to deserialize parameters given in the WikiML. If it is impossible to deserialize the value, the output object is not initialized at all. Usualy this function does nothing.
